title: Free Ashe / Garen Chest
body:
I just got level 30 and still no chest.
I sent a ticket a couple weeks ago but no response.

replies.body: Yeah, it doesn't look like you received the new player chest.  Sorry about that!  It's now been added to the account.  Grats on 30!

Thanks for the quick response!
However the chest didn't contain the champs, but an Evelyn skin!
Can you fix that pretty please? :D
Corrected!  Give your client a reboot to update your loot!

I've had the same issue, still waiting on mine. :( 
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
